unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We at XYZ Corp. have seen great success recruiting from IIT Delhi. Our next drive is scheduled for 28/02/2024. We're targeting fresh graduates with packages starting at Rs. 8 Lakhs. Please confirm your attendance by 17/02/2024, 17:00 hrs IST. This is a great opportunity for both XYZ and budding engineers! Final interviews will be held on 05/03/2024.
